thread.title: German econmin: Greek crisis is relatively small problem in Europe
thread.title_full: German econmin: Greek crisis is relatively small problem in Europe | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: German econmin: Greek crisis is relatively small problem in Europe
text:
BERLIN, July 3 German Economy Minister Sigmar Gabriel said on Friday that the Greek debt crisis was a comparatively little problem in Europe.
"I think that in the discussion about Greece, we forget ... that this is a relatively small problem in Europe," he said after mentioning the Ukraine conflict. (Reporting by Gernot Heller ; Writing by Michelle Martin; Editing by Michael Nienaber)
